div.bibl: The American Jewish Year Book. 5662. September 14, 1901, to October 1, 1902. Edited by Cyrus Adler.

body.p: LIST OF JEWISH PERIODICALS NOW APPEARING IN THE UNITED STATES.
Chicagoer Wochenblatt - Yiddish weekly. Chicago weekly edition of Der Judischer Courier.
The Chicago Israelite - English weekly, Chicago. Chicago edition of the American Israelite.
Der Judischer Courier - Yiddish daily, Chicago. English title, The Jewish Courier.
Der Judischer Kol - Yiddish daily, Chicago. English title, The Daily Jewish Call.
The Reform Advocate, - English weekly, Chicago.
